name: Portuguese Cod Fish Casserole
author: John J. Pacheco
summary: An excellent cod fish dish. You must soak the salted cod over night and change the water at least twice. This is an easy fish meal with my mom's original ingredients.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes
directions: Soak salted cod in cold water overnight or for a few hours
Heat a large pot of water until boiling
Cook cod for 5 minutes; drain and cool, leaving cod in large pieces
Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
In an 8x11 casserole dish, layer half the potato slices, all of the cod, and all of the onions
In a small bowl, mix together olive oil, garlic, parsley, pepper flakes, paprika, and tomato sauce
Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until potatoes are tender
